content.json: ## Web Session Essentials --- The 'Web Session Essentials' workbook provides real-time insights into activity and potential threats in your network. This workbook is designed for network teams, security architects, analysts, and consultants to monitor, identify and investigate threats on Web servers, Web Proxies and Web Security Gateways assets. This Workbook gives a summary of analysed web traffic and helps with threat analysis and investigating suspicious http traffic. The "SummarizeWebSessionData" Playbook installed along with the solution helps in summarizing the logs and improving the performance of the Workbook and data searches. This Workbook leverages the default as well as custom web session summarized data tables for visualising the data. Although enabling the summarization playbook is optional, we highly recommend enabling it for better user experience in environments with high EPS (events per second) data ingestion. Please note that summarization would require the playbook to run on a scheduled basis to utilise this workbook's capabilities. Summarized web session data can found in following custom tables: - WebSession_Summarized_SrcInfo_CL - WebSession_Summarized_SrcIP_CL - WebSession_Summarized_DstIP_CL - WebSession_Summarized_ThreatInfo_CL

content.query:
let LastIngestionTime = toscalar (
    union isfuzzy=true 
        (
        WebSession_Summarized_SrcIP_CL
        | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
        | summarize max_TimeGenerated=max(EventTime_t)
        | extend max_TimeGenerated = datetime_add('hour', 1, max_TimeGenerated)
        ),
        (
        print({TimeRange:start})
        | extend max_TimeGenerated = print_0
        | project max_TimeGenerated
        )
    | summarize maxTimeGenerated = max(max_TimeGenerated) 
    );
let uniqueConnection = 
union isfuzzy=true 
    (
        _Im_WebSession(starttime=todatetime(LastIngestionTime), endtime=now())
        | where EventType =~ 'WebServerSession'
		| where isnotempty(SrcIpAddr) and isnotempty(Url)
        | extend DestHostname = tostring(parse_url(Url)["Host"])
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
		| summarize count() by SrcIpAddr, DestHostname
    ),
    (  
        WebSession_Summarized_SrcIP_CL
        | where EventType_s =~ 'WebServerSession'
        | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
		| where isnotempty(SrcIpAddr_s) and isnotempty(DestDomain_s)
        | extend SrcIpAddr=SrcIpAddr_s, DestHostname=DestDomain_s, SrcUsername=SrcUsername_s, SrcHostname=SrcHostname_s
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
		| summarize count() by SrcIpAddr, DestHostname
    )
    | summarize count() by SrcIpAddr, DestHostname
    | count
    | extend Metric = "Unique Connections", orderNum = 1;
let products = 
    union isfuzzy=true 
        (
        _Im_WebSession(starttime=todatetime(LastIngestionTime), endtime=now())
        | where EventType =~ 'WebServerSession'
        | extend DestHostname = tostring(parse_url(Url)["Host"])
        | where isnotempty(EventProduct)
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | distinct EventProduct
        ),
        (  
        WebSession_Summarized_SrcIP_CL
        | where EventType_s =~ 'WebServerSession'
        | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
        | where isnotempty(EventProduct_s)
        | extend SrcIpAddr=SrcIpAddr_s, DestHostname=DestDomain_s, SrcUsername=SrcUsername_s, SrcHostname=SrcHostname_s
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | distinct EventProduct=EventProduct_s
        )
    | distinct EventProduct
    | count
    | extend Metric = "Product Count", orderNum = 2;
let UserNames = 
    union isfuzzy=true 
        (
        _Im_WebSession(starttime=todatetime(LastIngestionTime), endtime=now())
        | where EventType =~ 'WebServerSession'
        | extend DestHostname = tostring(parse_url(Url)["Host"])
        | where isnotempty(SrcUsername)
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | distinct SrcUsername
        ),
        (  
        WebSession_Summarized_SrcIP_CL
        | where EventType_s =~ 'WebServerSession'
        | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
        | where isnotempty(SrcUsername_s)
        | extend SrcIpAddr=SrcIpAddr_s, DestHostname=DestDomain_s, SrcUsername=SrcUsername_s, SrcHostname=SrcHostname_s
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | distinct SrcUsername
        )
    | distinct SrcUsername
    | count
    | extend Metric = "Unique UserNames", orderNum = 3;
let Srchosts = 
    union isfuzzy=true 
        (
        _Im_WebSession(starttime=todatetime(LastIngestionTime), endtime=now())
        | where EventType =~ 'WebServerSession'
        | where isnotempty(SrcHostname)
        | extend DestHostname = tostring(parse_url(Url)["Host"])
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | distinct SrcHostname
        ),
        (  
        WebSession_Summarized_SrcIP_CL
        | where EventType_s =~ 'WebServerSession'
        | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
        | where isnotempty(SrcHostname_s)
        | extend SrcIpAddr=SrcIpAddr_s, DestHostname=DestDomain_s, SrcUsername=SrcUsername_s, SrcHostname=SrcHostname_s
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | distinct SrcHostname=SrcHostname_s
        )
    | distinct SrcHostname
    | count
    | extend Metric = "Source HostNames", orderNum = 4;
let ClientIPs = 
    union isfuzzy=true 
        (
        _Im_WebSession(starttime=todatetime(LastIngestionTime), endtime=now())
        | where EventType =~ 'WebServerSession'
        | where isnotempty(SrcIpAddr)
        | extend DestHostname = tostring(parse_url(Url)["Host"])
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | distinct SrcIpAddr
        ),
        (  
        WebSession_Summarized_SrcIP_CL
        | where EventType_s =~ 'WebServerSession'
        | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
        | where isnotempty(SrcIpAddr_s)
        | extend SrcIpAddr=SrcIpAddr_s, DestHostname=DestDomain_s, SrcUsername=SrcUsername_s, SrcHostname=SrcHostname_s
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | distinct SrcIpAddr=SrcIpAddr_s
        )
    | distinct SrcIpAddr
    | count
    | extend Metric = "Unique Source IPs", orderNum = 5;
let DestHostName = 
    union isfuzzy=true 
        (
        _Im_WebSession(starttime=todatetime(LastIngestionTime), endtime=now())
        | where EventType =~ 'WebServerSession'
        | where isnotempty(Url)
        | extend DestHostname = tostring(parse_url(Url)["Host"])
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | distinct DestHostname
        ),
        (  
        WebSession_Summarized_SrcIP_CL
        | where EventType_s =~ 'WebServerSession'
        | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
        | where isnotempty(DestDomain_s)
        | extend SrcIpAddr=SrcIpAddr_s, DestHostname=DestDomain_s, SrcUsername=SrcUsername_s, SrcHostname=SrcHostname_s
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | distinct DestHostname
        )
    | distinct DestHostname
    | count
    | extend Metric = "Unique Dest Sites", orderNum = 6;
let TotalUserAgents = 
    union isfuzzy=true 
        (
        _Im_WebSession(starttime=todatetime(LastIngestionTime), endtime=now())
        | where EventType =~ 'WebServerSession'
        | where isnotempty(HttpUserAgent)
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}))
        | distinct HttpUserAgent
        ),
        (
        WebSession_Summarized_SrcInfo_CL
        | where EventType_s =~ 'WebServerSession'
        | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
        | where isnotempty(HttpUserAgent_s)
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}))
        | distinct HttpUserAgent=HttpUserAgent_s
        )
    | distinct HttpUserAgent
    | count
    | extend Metric = "Unique UserAgents", orderNum = 7;
let ServerErrorsCount =    
union isfuzzy=true 
    (
        _Im_WebSession(starttime=todatetime(LastIngestionTime), endtime=now())
        | where EventType =~ 'WebServerSession'
        | where toint(EventResultDetails) between (500 .. 599)
        | extend DestHostname = tostring(parse_url(Url)["Host"])
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | summarize EventCount=tolong(count()) by EventResultDetails, bin(TimeGenerated,{TimeRange:grain})
    ),
    (
        WebSession_Summarized_SrcIP_CL
        | where EventType_s =~ 'WebServerSession'
        | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
        | where toint(EventResultDetails_s) between (500 .. 599)
        | extend SrcIpAddr=SrcIpAddr_s, DestHostname=DestDomain_s, SrcUsername=SrcUsername_s, SrcHostname=SrcHostname_s, EventResultDetails=EventResultDetails_s, EventTime = EventTime_t, EventCount = EventCount_d
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | summarize EventCount=tolong(sum(EventCount)) by EventResultDetails, bin(TimeGenerated=EventTime,{TimeRange:grain})
    )
    | summarize Count = sum(EventCount)
    | extend Metric = "Total Server Errors", orderNum = 8;
let ClientErrorsCount =    
union isfuzzy=true 
    (
        _Im_WebSession(starttime=todatetime(LastIngestionTime), endtime=now())
        | where EventType =~ 'WebServerSession'
        | where toint(EventResultDetails) between (400 .. 499)
        | extend DestHostname = tostring(parse_url(Url)["Host"])
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | summarize EventCount=tolong(count()) by EventResultDetails, bin(TimeGenerated,{TimeRange:grain})
    ),
    (
        WebSession_Summarized_SrcIP_CL
        | where EventType_s =~ 'WebServerSession'
        | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
        | where toint(EventResultDetails_s) between (400 .. 499)
        | extend SrcIpAddr=SrcIpAddr_s, DestHostname=DestDomain_s, SrcUsername=SrcUsername_s, SrcHostname=SrcHostname_s, EventResultDetails=EventResultDetails_s, EventTime = EventTime_t, EventCount = EventCount_d
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | summarize EventCount=tolong(sum(EventCount)) by EventResultDetails, bin(TimeGenerated=EventTime,{TimeRange:grain})
    )
    | summarize Count = sum(EventCount)
    | extend Metric = "Total Client Errors", orderNum = 9;
union uniqueConnection, products, UserNames, Srchosts, ClientIPs, DestHostName, TotalUserAgents, ServerErrorsCount, ClientErrorsCount | where Count != 0
| order by orderNum asc

let LastIngestionTime = toscalar (
    union isfuzzy=true
        (
            WebSession_Summarized_SrcIP_CL
                | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
                | summarize max_TimeGenerated=max(EventTime_t)
                | extend max_TimeGenerated = datetime_add('hour', 1, max_TimeGenerated)
        ),
        (
            print({TimeRange:start})
            | extend max_TimeGenerated = print_0
            | project max_TimeGenerated
        )
        | summarize maxTimeGenerated = max(max_TimeGenerated) 
    );
union isfuzzy=true 
    (
        _Im_WebSession(starttime=todatetime(LastIngestionTime), endtime=now())
        | where EventType =~ 'WebServerSession'
        | where isnotempty(EventProduct)
        | extend DestHostname = tostring(parse_url(Url)["Host"])
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | summarize EventCount=tolong(count()) by EventProduct, bin(TimeGenerated,{TimeRange:grain})
    ),
    (
        WebSession_Summarized_SrcIP_CL
        | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
        | where EventType_s =~ 'WebServerSession'
        | extend EventProduct = EventProduct_s
        | where isnotempty(EventProduct)
        | extend SrcIpAddr=SrcIpAddr_s, DestHostname=DestDomain_s, SrcUsername=SrcUsername_s, SrcHostname=SrcHostname_s
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | summarize EventCount=tolong(sum(EventCount_d)) by EventProduct, bin(TimeGenerated=EventTime_t,{TimeRange:grain})
    )
    | summarize EventCount = sum(EventCount) by EventProduct, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})

content.query:
let LastIngestionTime = toscalar (
    union isfuzzy=true 
        (
        WebSession_Summarized_SrcIP_CL
        | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
        | summarize LastIngestionTime=max(TimeGenerated)
        | extend max_TimeGenerated = datetime_add('hour', 1, max_TimeGenerated)
        ),
        (
        print({TimeRange:start})
        | extend max_TimeGenerated = print_0
        | project max_TimeGenerated
        )
    | summarize maxTimeGenerated = max(max_TimeGenerated) 
    );  
union isfuzzy=true 
    (
    _Im_WebSession(starttime=todatetime(LastIngestionTime), endtime=now())
    | where EventType =~ 'WebServerSession'
    | where isnotempty(EventResultDetails) and EventResultDetails !~ 'NA'
    | where toint(EventResultDetails) between (400 .. 599)
    | extend DestHostname = tostring(parse_url(Url)["Host"])
    | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
    | summarize EventCount=tolong(count()) by EventResultDetails, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
    ),
    (
    WebSession_Summarized_SrcIP_CL
    | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
    | where EventType_s =~ 'WebServerSession'
    | project
        EventResultDetails= EventResultDetails_s,
        EventTime = EventTime_t,
        EventCount = EventCount_d,
        SrcIpAddr=SrcIpAddr_s,
        DestHostname=DestDomain_s,
        SrcUsername=SrcUsername_s,
        SrcHostname=SrcHostname_s
    | where isnotempty(EventResultDetails) and EventResultDetails !~ 'NA'
    | where toint(EventResultDetails) between (400 .. 599)
    | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
    | summarize EventCount=tolong(sum(EventCount)) by EventResultDetails, bin(TimeGenerated=EventTime, {TimeRange:grain})
    )
| summarize EventCount = sum(EventCount) by EventResultDetails, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})

content.query:
let LastIngestionTime = toscalar (
    union isfuzzy=true 
        (
        WebSession_Summarized_SrcIP_CL
        | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
        | summarize max_TimeGenerated=max(TimeGenerated)
        | extend max_TimeGenerated = datetime_add('hour', 1, max_TimeGenerated)
        ),
        (
        print({TimeRange:start})
        | extend max_TimeGenerated = print_0
        | project max_TimeGenerated
        )
    | summarize maxTimeGenerated = max(max_TimeGenerated) 
    );
let WebData =    
    union isfuzzy=true
        (
        _Im_WebSession(starttime=todatetime(LastIngestionTime), endtime=now())
        | where EventType =~ 'WebServerSession'
        | extend User = coalesce(SrcUsername, SrcIpAddr)
        | where isnotempty(User) and ipv4_is_private(SrcIpAddr)
        | extend DestHostname = tostring(parse_url(Url)["Host"])
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | summarize RequestCount=tolong(count()) by User, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
        ),
        (
        WebSession_Summarized_SrcIP_CL
        | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
        | where EventType_s =~ 'WebServerSession'
        | extend User = coalesce(SrcUsername_s, SrcIpAddr_s)
        | where isnotempty(User) and ipv4_is_private(SrcIpAddr_s)
        | extend SrcIpAddr=SrcIpAddr_s, DestHostname=DestDomain_s, SrcUsername=SrcUsername_s, SrcHostname=SrcHostname_s, EventTime=EventTime_t, EventCount=EventCount_d
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | summarize RequestCount=tolong(sum(EventCount)) by User, bin(TimeGenerated=EventTime, {TimeRange:grain})
        )
    | summarize RequestCount = sum(RequestCount) by User, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain});
WebData
| summarize RequestCount = sum(RequestCount) by User
| order by RequestCount desc
| take 10

content.query:
let common_file_ext_list = dynamic([".txt", ".xlsx", ".doc", ".docx", ".csv", ".pdf", ".png", ".jpg", ".jpeg"]); // Add list of common files as per your environment
_Im_WebSession (starttime={TimeRange:start}, eventresult='Success')
| where EventType =~ 'WebServerSession'
| where HttpRequestMethod in~ ("POST", "PUT") 
| project
    Url,
    SrcIpAddr,
    SrcUsername,
    SrcHostname,
    DstIpAddr,
    DstPortNumber,
    DstHostname,
    TimeGenerated
| extend requestedFileName=tostring(split(tostring(parse_url(Url)["Path"]), '/')[-1])
| extend FileWithdualextension = extract(@'([\w-]+\.\w+\.\w+)$', 1, requestedFileName, typeof(string))
| extend SecondExt = tostring(split(FileWithdualextension, '.')[-1])
| where strcat('.', SecondExt) in~ (common_file_ext_list) // Second extension is mostly from the common files
| summarize
    EventCount=count(),
    EventStartTime=min(TimeGenerated),
    EventEndTime=max(TimeGenerated)
    by
    SrcIpAddr,
    Url,
    FileWithdualextension,
    SrcUsername,
    SrcHostname,
    DstIpAddr,
    DstPortNumber,
    DstHostname

content.query:
let LastIngestionTime = toscalar (
    union isfuzzy=true 
        (
        WebSession_Summarized_SrcIP_CL
        | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
        | summarize LastIngestionTime=max(EventTime_t)
        | extend max_TimeGenerated = datetime_add('hour', 1, LastIngestionTime)
        ),
        (
        print({TimeRange:start})
        | extend max_TimeGenerated = print_0
        | project max_TimeGenerated
        )
    | summarize maxTimeGenerated = max(max_TimeGenerated) 
    );
let WebData =    
    union isfuzzy=true 
        (
        _Im_WebSession(starttime=todatetime(LastIngestionTime), endtime=now())
        | extend DestDomain = tostring(parse_url(Url)["Host"])
            | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
     and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
     and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
     and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestDomain in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | extend User = coalesce(SrcUsername, SrcIpAddr)
        | where isnotempty(User) and isnotempty(DestDomain)
        | summarize RequestCount=tolong(count()) by User, DestDomain, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
        ),
        (
        WebSession_Summarized_SrcIP_CL
        | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
        | project
            SrcUsername=SrcUsername_s,
            SrcIpAddr=SrcIpAddr_s,
            SrcHostname=SrcHostname_s,
            TimeGenerated=EventTime_t,
            DestDomain=DestDomain_s,
            EventCount=EventCount_d
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
     and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
     and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
     and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestDomain in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | extend User = coalesce(SrcUsername, SrcIpAddr)
        | where isnotempty(User) and isnotempty(DestDomain)
        | summarize RequestCount=tolong(sum(EventCount)) by User, DestDomain, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
        )
    | summarize RequestCount = sum(RequestCount) by User, DestDomain, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain});
let UserData = WebData
    | summarize RequestCount=sum(RequestCount) by User
    | join kind=inner (WebData
        | make-series Trend = sum(RequestCount) on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to now() step {TimeRange:grain} by User)
        on User
    | order by RequestCount desc, User asc;
WebData
| summarize RequestCount=sum(RequestCount) by User, DestDomain
| join kind=inner (WebData
| make-series Trend = sum(RequestCount) on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to now() step {TimeRange:grain} by User, DestDomain
) on User, DestDomain
| order by RequestCount desc, User asc
| project Id=DestDomain, Name=DestDomain, RequestCount, Trend, ParentId=User, Type='DestDomain'
| union (UserData
| project Id=User, Name=User, RequestCount, Trend, ParentId = 'root', Type='User'
)
| order by RequestCount desc, Name asc
| take 25

                   )
        | where Website != "NA" and isnotempty(DstBytes)
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
            and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
            and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
            and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (Website in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | where Website != "NA" and isnotempty(DstBytes)
        | summarize DataReceived=tolong(sum(DstBytes)) by Website, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
        ),
        (
        WebSession_Summarized_SrcIP_CL
        | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
        | project
            SrcIpAddr=SrcIpAddr_s,
            EventResultDetails=EventResultDetails_s,
            EventCount=EventCount_d,
            EventTime=EventTime_t,
            SrcUsername=SrcUsername_s,
            SrcHostname=SrcHostname_s,
            DestHostname=DestDomain_s,
            DstBytes= DstBytes_d
        | extend Website = case(
                       isnotempty(DestHostname),
                       DestHostname
            ,
                       "NA"
                   )
        | where Website != "NA" and isnotempty(DstBytes)
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
            and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
            and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}) or (SrcHostname in~ ({SrcHostname})))
            and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (Website in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | summarize DataReceived=tolong(sum(DstBytes)) by Website, bin(TimeGenerated=EventTime, {TimeRange:grain})
        )
    | summarize DataReceived = sum(DataReceived) by Website, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain});
WebData
| summarize DataReceived = sum(DataReceived) by Website
| join kind=inner (WebData
    | make-series Trend = sum(DataReceived) on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to now() step {TimeRange:grain} by Website
    )
    on Website
| project Website, DataReceivedinMB=DataReceived / 1048576, Trend
| order by DataReceivedinMB desc
| take 25

content.query:
let exludeString = dynamic ( [ "/", "None","" ]);
let LastIngestionTime = toscalar (
    union isfuzzy=true 
        (
        WebSession_Summarized_ThreatInfo_CL
        | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
        | summarize max_TimeGenerated=max(EventTime_t)
        | extend max_TimeGenerated = datetime_add('hour', 1, max_TimeGenerated)
        ),
        (
        print({TimeRange:start})
        | extend max_TimeGenerated = print_0
        | project max_TimeGenerated
        )
    | summarize maxTimeGenerated = max(max_TimeGenerated) 
    );
let distinctThreats = 
    union isfuzzy=true 
        (
        _Im_WebSession(starttime=todatetime(LastIngestionTime), endtime=now())
        | where (ThreatName !in~ (exludeString) and isnotempty(ThreatName))
        | extend DestHostname = tostring(parse_url(Url)["Host"])
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        ),
        (
        WebSession_Summarized_ThreatInfo_CL
        | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
        | where (ThreatName_s !in~ (exludeString) and isnotempty(ThreatName_s))
        | extend ThreatName = ThreatName_s
        | extend SrcIpAddr=SrcIpAddr_s, DestHostname=DestDomain_s, SrcUsername=SrcUsername_s
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        )
    | summarize Result=tostring(dcount(ThreatName))
    | extend Query = "Distinct ThreatNames", orderNum = 1;
let distinctThreatCategory = 
    union isfuzzy=true 
        (
        _Im_WebSession(starttime=todatetime(LastIngestionTime), endtime=now())
        | where (ThreatCategory !in~ (exludeString) and isnotempty(ThreatCategory))
        | extend DestHostname = tostring(parse_url(Url)["Host"])
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        ),
        (  
        WebSession_Summarized_ThreatInfo_CL
        | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
        | where (ThreatCategory_s !in~ (exludeString) and isnotempty(ThreatCategory_s))
        | extend SrcIpAddr=SrcIpAddr_s, DestHostname=DestDomain_s, SrcUsername=SrcUsername_s
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | extend ThreatCategory = ThreatCategory_s
        )
    | summarize Result=tostring(dcount(ThreatCategory))
    | extend Query = "Distinct Threat Categories", orderNum = 2;
let maxRiskLevel = 
    union isfuzzy=true 
        (
        _Im_WebSession(starttime=todatetime(LastIngestionTime), endtime=now())
        | where ThreatRiskLevel > 60
        | extend DestHostname = tostring(parse_url(Url)["Host"])
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        ),
        (  
        WebSession_Summarized_ThreatInfo_CL
        | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
        | where ThreatRiskLevel_d > 60
        | extend SrcIpAddr=SrcIpAddr_s, DestHostname=DestDomain_s, SrcUsername=SrcUsername_s
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | extend ThreatRiskLevel = toint(ThreatRiskLevel_d)
        )
    | summarize Max_RiskLevel=max(ThreatRiskLevel)
    | extend Result=tostring(iff(isempty(Max_RiskLevel), 0, Max_RiskLevel))
    | extend Query = "Maximum RiskLevel", orderNum = 3;
let maxThreatConfidence = 
    union isfuzzy=true 
        (
        _Im_WebSession(starttime=todatetime(LastIngestionTime), endtime=now())
        | extend ThreatOriginalConfidence=toint(ThreatOriginalConfidence)
        | where ThreatOriginalConfidence > 0
        | extend DestHostname = tostring(parse_url(Url)["Host"])
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        ),
        (  
        WebSession_Summarized_ThreatInfo_CL
        | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
        | where toint(ThreatOriginalConfidence_d) > 0
        | extend SrcIpAddr=SrcIpAddr_s, DestHostname=DestDomain_s, SrcUsername=SrcUsername_s, ThreatOriginalConfidence=ThreatOriginalConfidence_d
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | extend ThreatOriginalConfidence = toint(ThreatOriginalConfidence)
        )
    | summarize Max_ThreatOriginalConfidence=max(ThreatOriginalConfidence)
    | extend Result=tostring(iff(isempty(Max_ThreatOriginalConfidence), 0, Max_ThreatOriginalConfidence))
    | extend Query = "Maximum ThreatConfidence", orderNum = 4;
let MaxEventSeverity = 
    union isfuzzy=true 
        (
        _Im_WebSession(starttime=todatetime(LastIngestionTime), endtime=now())
        | where isnotempty(EventSeverity) and EventSeverity != 'Informational'
        | extend DestHostname = tostring(parse_url(Url)["Host"])
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | distinct EventSeverity
        ),
        (  
        WebSession_Summarized_ThreatInfo_CL
        | where EventTime_t >= {TimeRange:start}
        | where isnotempty(EventSeverity_s)
        | extend SrcIpAddr=SrcIpAddr_s, DestHostname=DestDomain_s, SrcUsername=SrcUsername_s
        | where ('*' in~ ({SrcIpAddr}) or (SrcIpAddr in~ ({SrcIpAddr})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcUsername}) or (SrcUsername in~ ({SrcUsername})))
        and ('*' in~ ({SrcHostname}))
        and ('*' in~ ({DstHostname}) or (DestHostname in~ ({DstHostname})))
        | distinct EventSeverity=EventSeverity_s
        )
    | distinct EventSeverity
    | summarize EventSeverity=make_set(EventSeverity, 5)
    | extend Result=case(
                               EventSeverity has 'High',
                               'High',
                               EventSeverity has 'Medium',
                               'Medium',
                               EventSeverity has 'Low',
                               'Low',
                               EventSeverity has 'Informational',
                               'Informational',
                               EventSeverity
                           )
    | extend Query = "Max Event Severity", orderNum = 5;
union distinctThreatCategory, distinctThreats, maxRiskLevel, maxThreatConfidence, MaxEventSeverity
| order by orderNum asc
